1324850.name: Arrog Demo
1324850.description:
Arrog is an enigmatic puzzle adventure game featuring hand-drawn art and set in a bizarre black-and-white world with color accents. The story of the game is about the journey of a man accepting his death through his dreams.

Features of the full game


  • A tale about the journey of a man accepting his death through his dreams.
  • A unique black-and-white art style and traditional animations used in a bizarre world.
  • A hand-crafted soundtrack for each section of the game.
1324850.supported_languages: 英语, 简体中文, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲
